item.title: By: Elizabeth Scott
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Scott
item.description: I was in 7th as well. With a bunch of 8th graders.
item.content:encoded: I was in 7th as well. With a bunch of 8th graders.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2008/11/14/eureka-episode-1-inertia/#comment-2463">Elizabeth Scott</a>.
Hmmm, I'm pretty sure I took that in 7th grade, not 8th grade. If my memory is right some did it in 8th and others in 7th, just depended on what year you landed in.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Elizabeth Scott.

Hmmm, I’m pretty sure I took that in 7th grade, not 8th grade. If my memory is right some did it in 8th and others in 7th, just depended on what year you landed in.

item.title: By: Elizabeth Scott
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Scott
item.description: Actually, Joey, you saw them in 8th grade science. In Dad's class to be precise.
item.content:encoded: Actually, Joey, you saw them in 8th grade science. In Dad’s class to be precise.

item.title: By: Laura Moncur
item.dc:creator: Laura Moncur
item.description: OMG! That was totally AWESOME! I've never seen those cartoons before, but they would have been great for learning about physics. I had to do it the HARD way. I had to look things up so I could get the jokes...
item.content:encoded: OMG! That was totally AWESOME! I’ve never seen those cartoons before, but they would have been great for learning about physics. I had to do it the HARD way. I had to look things up so I could get the jokes…
